channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello Blog
item.description: For now this is intended to be my second brain. Bring together the scattered notes from notebooks, post-its, book margins, the cloud, local files, wherever. Also kind of an open journal. Things that, while they may be personal, like most things I don’t mind them being publicly visible. So a little bit of a status brain dump to begin. We’ve got a few things going on actively or tumbling around the back of the brain.
